page.title: 01General review of the block.
page.content: The area covered in our Domesday survey is a rural area consisting of three villages, Lockington,Lund and Kilnwick and a number of farms.There are natural woodland areas and plantations which are quite new.The block is situated between two main roads which lead to Malton and Driffield.The villages each have their own church and there are chapels in Lockington and Lund.There are public houses in Lockington and Lund but not Kilnwick.Recreational facilities are few although there is a sports hall in Driffield seven miles away.A bus service runs through the area but there are no railways.
